citations.narrative:
***The sugar gliders have accumulations of waste material and excreta on the floors and pans of the enclosures. While
downsizing there are numerous pans an empty cages remaining in the room that have not been cleaned and sanitized
and still contain waste material. The floor in the room has spilled bedding and waste indicating it has not been cleaned
recently. Accumulations of waste material and excreta increases the risk of allowing the sugar gliders to become
contaminated. Unclean cages increases odors which will attract insects and other pests increasing the risk of disease
hazard. Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent contamination of the animals
contained therein and to minimize disease hazards and to reduce odors.
Correct by August 31, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
***The sugar gliders have accumulations of waste material and excreta on the floors and pans of the enclosures. While 
downsizing there are numerous pans an empty cages remaining in the room that have not been cleaned and sanitized 
and still contain waste material. The floor in the room has spilled bedding and waste indicating it has not been cleaned 
recently. Accumulations of waste material and excreta increases the risk of allowing the sugar gliders to become 
contaminated. Unclean cages increases odors which will attract insects and other pests increasing the risk of disease 
hazard. Excreta shall be removed from primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent contamination of the animals 
contained therein and to minimize disease hazards and to reduce odors. 
 
Correct by August 31, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee. 
 
 n
